description: This table will extract bookmarks from the HNO database.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TAG_EXTERNAL_LOCAL_IDENT
columns.description: The locally-assigned unique identifier of the tagged external note.

columns.name: TAG_EXTERNAL_SOURCE_DXR_CSN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the tagged note's source DXR contact.

columns.name: TAG_EXTERNAL_ENC_START_DTTM
columns.description: The start instant of the encounter associated with the tagged external note.

columns.name: TAG_EXTERNAL_ENC_END_DTTM
columns.description: The end instant of the encounter associated with the tagged external note.

columns.name: TAG_EXTERNAL_ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mapped encounter type ID of the encounter associated with the tagged external note.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TAG_EXTERNAL_ENC_TYPE
columns.description: The free-text encounter type name of the encounter associated with the tagged external note.

columns.name: TAG_EXTERNAL_ENC_REF_IDENT
columns.description: The reference ID of the encounter associated with the tagged external note.
